entries.title: Hulk Hogan funeral and memorial plans revealed after WWE icon's tragic death at 71
entries.content: Hogan, real name Terry Bollea, died from a cardiac arrest on July 24 and was also fighting leukemia at the time of his passing. He had been taken ill at home in Clearwater, Florida.
